definition[0]: someone who is directly below another person in rank, and who is officially in charge when that person is not there
definition[1]: someone whose job is to help a sheriff in the US
definition[2]: a member of parliament in some countries, for example France
definition[3]: someone in an organization who is immediately below the rank of another important person, and who is officially in charge when that other person is not there
example[1]: He was appointed deputy chairman and managing director in 2006.
example[2]: the deputy leader of the Democrat Party
